triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: Llama 2 is a collection of large language models ranging from 7B to 70B parameters that the paper develops and releases.

triples.name: Fine-tuning (deep learning)
triples.relevance: The paper develops a detailed approach to fine-tuning Llama 2 for chat applications and safety improvements.

triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: Llama 2-Chat is optimized specifically for dialogue use cases and conversational interactions.

triples.name: AI safety
triples.relevance: The paper provides detailed descriptions of safety improvements and helpfulness measures for LLMs.

triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: Llama 2-Chat models function as conversational chatbots optimized for dialogue applications.

triples.name: Open-source software
triples.relevance: The paper releases Llama 2 as open-source models, contrasting with closed-source alternatives.

triples.name: Evaluation (machine learning)
triples.relevance: The paper employs human evaluations for helpfulness and safety to assess model performance.
